name: Throw da Egg
description:
THE EPIC WAR OF CHICKENS AND CROCODILES FOR THE RIGHT TO POSSESS ONE LOST EGG!!! WHO WILL WIN??? (of course chickens you dummy you're playing for chickens eh) NO RAW CHICKEN BREASTS I PROMISE.

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrows — move

SPACE BAR — throw an egg / choose a level on the level selection screen

R — restart

CREDITS

kr0tyara — programming, art, level design

Kettako — beautiful OST

SOUNDTRACK

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1059821
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1059823

Made with love for egg-themed NewGrounds July Jam 2021
